attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for child sex offenders
attributes.additional_details:
Babies and children being sexually abused, raped and violated by adults who have gained trust. These include teachers etc. children are innocent and this wicked behaviour is completely unacceptable! 
Pedophile rings targeting innocent vulnerable babies and children for their own sexual needs is sickening . They deserve no human rights as a decent human being would not carry out this act! More needs to be done!
attributes.background: Too many child sex offenders being sentenced to prison and I do not think it is enough punishment. I've Just read an article of a gang raping babies after drugging them then streaming it on the Internet. Vile!
